title: OpenCodeList Document Schema Specification
description: The specification of Open Code List Representation Format (OpenCodeList) v0.1.x documents

opencodelist.description: The version of the OpenCodeList Document Schema

codeListSet.description: Definition of a code list set, which is a list of referenced code lists.

codeList.description: Definition of a single code list.

agency.description: Agency that is responsible for publication and/or maintenance of the codes.

columnRef.description: Reference to a column ID in the document. If this field does not exist, the value of the array index of this cell is used to refer to a column definition with the same array index.

value.description: The value. It must be valid with respect to the type and restrictions of the matching column.

oneOf.description: A null status. Only permitted if the column definition provides for this.
A numeric value. Only permitted if the column definition is `integer` or `number`.
A boolean value. Only permitted if the column definition is `boolean`.
An embedded json object. Only permitted if the column definition is `object`.
A string value. Only permitted if the column definition is NOT `boolean`, `integer`, `number` or `object`.
A list of localized string values. Only permitted if the column definition is NOT `boolean`, `integer`, `number` or `object`.
